channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Chasing yield’ was an inside joke at SVB—until it led to the bank’s collapse
item.description: Back in 2011, some of the bank leaders were involved in running jokes about chasing yield—now they don't seem so funny.

item.title: How to watch Week Six of the 2024-2025 NFL season live online for free—and without cable
item.description: The best team take a break this week.

item.title: Hurricanes Helene, Milton walloped parts of the U.S. What will they do to GDP?
Boeing to lay off 10% of employees, warns of quarterly loss and lower sales
Dow, S&P 500 close at record highs as stock investors cheer bank earnings
UK leader Keir Starmer is marking 100 days in office. It has been a rocky ride
item.description: Starmer's center-left Labour Party was elected by a landslide on July 4, sweeping back to power after 14 years.

item.title: Musk declares ‘science fiction without the fiction’ after giant SpaceX booster lands on launch pad
item.description: SpaceX has been recovering boosters of its Falcon 9 rockets for years, but they land on ocean platforms or on concrete slabs miles from their launch p...

item.title: Here’s how stocks have performed under Biden-Harris vs. under Trump
Trump and Harris spending plans could be dashed by another ‘great bond massacre'
I tried virtual reality yoga on Meta’s $500 headset. It was a glimpse into the future of workouts
item.description: Alo Moves has introduced mini-instructors which means that you can see a pose from all angles and tweak your own form to match.

item.title: U.S. officials say Israel has narrowed down its targets for strike on Iran
item.description: The Middle East region has been on edge awaiting Isreal's response to an Iranian missile barrage launched on Oct. 1.

item.title: China's consumer inflation cools in September, PPI deflation deepens
item.description: China's consumer inflation rate fell in September, while producer price deflation deepened, even as Beijing rolls out more stimulus measures.

item.title: China’s deflation problem worsens on weak consumer prices
item.description: China is facing the longest period of deflation since the 1990s, with a broad measure of economy-wide prices falling for five straight quarters throug...

item.title: Lithuanians vote in parliamentary election with many looking for change despite a strong economy
item.description: Lithuanians voted Sunday in the first round of parliamentary elections that could lead to the center-right governing coalition being replaced.

item.title: SpaceX’s Starship rocket completes fifth test flight, lands booster in dramatic catch
item.description: SpaceX launched its fifth test flight of its Starship rocket on Sunday, taking a major step forward in the vehicle's development.
